snippet.title: Death Upon An Austrian Sonata: A Dana Knightstone Novel
snippet.description:
iPad: http://bigfi.sh/1c1UWlx
iPhone: http://bigfi.sh/1aZ0YVP

Return to Europe in a brand new adventure as Dana Knightstone, the best-selling novelist who can see ghosts, in this amazing Collector's Edition!

• SEARCH FOR A MYSTERIOUS GHOST!
When your cousin, famed musician Sebastian Knightstone, starts hearing eerie violin music in his Austrian manor, he asks for your help to investigate.

• FIND YOURSELF FALLING HEADLONG INTO DANGER!
You're not the only one digging up the ghost's secrets. Use your wits to get out of one sticky situation after another!

• GORGEOUS EUROPEAN LOCATIONS
Solve challenging puzzles as you trek through snowy Austrian landscapes in search of missing clues.

• UNLOCK THIS COLLECTOR'S EDITION TO ACCESS GREAT BONUSES!
Check out the Wallpapers and concept art and re-visit all of your favorite cut scenes from the game. Can you follow the ghost's trail before time runs out?

TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME!
